name: Justhack
body: *JustHack* is a timer that can be used to set time for a specific task. If you have secondary monitors, then you can simply use JustHack on it. It is still under development and once I am done with the basic functionality, I will host it at [http://justhack.in](http://justhack.in).
tagline: A sweet timer for your hack needs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
